This vignette describes how to use each panel in the app. 

## Personal Info

The following is a list of all components in the first panel and a description. All fields are mandatory except with the Desired Retirement Age. They are pre-filled thus it is advisable to check all values before downloading the report. For those fields where there is a maximun, in case the users types is a higher number, the appilcation caps it to maximum.

- **Birthdate** can be inserted by either typing or using the calendar that appears when clicking on the box.
- **Gender Affiliation** is pre-selected to Male and can be changed to Female, however one field has to be chosen.
- **Desired Retirement Age** is not mandatory but can be specified in case that it is different from the standard values (65 for males and 64 for females). The maximum retirement age is 70.
- **Postal Code / Municipality** is the one of residence.
- **Marital Status** has three options and one needs to be chosen.
- **# Children** can be filled by either typing or using the arrows that appears when clicking on the box. The maximum value is 9.
- **Church Affiliation** only requires a yes or no answer. No spefication is requested.

## Occupational Pension Fund- Pillar II

This section includes all the fields related to the occupational pension fund. 

- **Current Annual Salary** in gross terms, before tax. 
- **Current BVG Assets** is the amount alredy invested on the Occupational pension fund. 
- **Expected Salary Growth Rate %**
- **Interest Rate % (optional)**
- **Voluntary Purchases**
- **Purchase Type**

## Private Pension FUnd- Pillar III

- **Current Assets**
- **Annual Contribution**
- **Expected Return %**
